title: Teeny Tiny Tina the Teeny Tiny Tooth Fairy
description: One of Rosemaryâ€™s granddaughters told her that when a tooth comes out and you leave it for the tooth fairy, she leaves you money. It inspired the author to write her first story about Teeny Tiny Tina, a cute little fairy who really, really wanted to be a tooth fairy, but everyone told her she was too teeny. You will enjoy discovering how Tina finally becomes a tooth fairy, in this wonderful, fun book.
author: Rosemary R. Evans
